email_body: i went to get the tix this morn and couldnt get them. i'll probably go to dinner. sorry "Jennifer White" <jenwhite7@zdnetonebox.com> on 04/11/2001 08:42:45 AM To: john.arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: tonight So do your plans for tonight involve business or pleasure?
